data.name: Rocketeer
data.detailed_description:
You - as a skillful space rocket pilot - have to survive in space. Use all your talent to pass through meteor fields or find your way out from a giant asteroid. None of the levels are impossible, everything depends on your talent! Keep an eye on your lights and once you passed a level, ask yourself: "Can I be faster?"
Use left and right arrows to turn your rocket, and give a boost with the up arrow. You can shoot projectiles with the spacebar, but you can destroy only the golden rocks and meteorites.
Your score is based on your speed, your accidents, and destroyed meteorites.
data.about_the_game:
You - as a skillful space rocket pilot - have to survive in space. Use all your talent to pass through meteor fields or find your way out from a giant asteroid. None of the levels are impossible, everything depends on your talent! Keep an eye on your lights and once you passed a level, ask yourself: "Can I be faster?"
Use left and right arrows to turn your rocket, and give a boost with the up arrow. You can shoot projectiles with the spacebar, but you can destroy only the golden rocks and meteorites.
Your score is based on your speed, your accidents, and destroyed meteorites.
data.short_description: This is a small arcade game in which you are a skilled pilot and you have to complete all levels. Use your arrows to move around, and avoid collisions. Shoot the destroyable meteorites for extra points! Every level has its own high score, try to beat it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
